He walked out of the board meeting, tears in his eyes, and told his wife, “This isn’t how I wanted to leave my baby!” 😢 

He completely shifted his life to focus on recovery while going through treatment. He changed his diet and spent a year in the South of France with his family. The treatment, along with a new climate and lifestyle, worked wonders. With a fresh mindset, he began reflecting on what he learned from the experience.

Fast forward two and a half years, Geoff found himself in Tanzania for a Young Global Leaders event with the World Economic Forum. One night, during an open-mic session, his friends encouraged him to share his story with a group of two hundred successful peers.

With deep emotion, he shared that he had paid a steep price to learn one crucial lesson: “Protect the asset.” 💪✨

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Geoff learned the crucial lesson to "protect the asset" of oneself after facing health challenges due to his demanding lifestyle.
